msbt.message: You like to read, don't you, ?What am I saying? Of course you do! But seriously Do you read a lot?
Sure! I love reading.
Not really...
A few things, sure.
Oh! Well, I'm not surprised.I just felt like you had to be an avid reader like meI'm so glad I was right, !
Oh well. I love reading, so I guess I assume that everyone else does too.I'd like to learn more about what you like, so We'll just have to get together to talk more, .
Oh really? Now I'm curious about the kinds of things you like to readI love reading, so I think this must mean that we have a lot of things in common, !
I've been having trouble deciding what book I should read from the growing pile that I keep adding to. I know! I'm going to list some titles You pick the one that I'll read next!
Officer Philosopher. Stolen Detective. The Fossil Murders.
Best of Nintendique. Early Riser. Nook: On My Work.
Unabridged Bestiary. On Horticulture. The Animalese Brain.
Ooh I love a good crime novel!<10_4 /> The best part is when they finally piece together who did it, and why. Thanks for your help I can't wait to start sleuthing, !

You think I should read some career advice next?You really do understand me!I always appreciate tips on achieving a good work-life balanceThis might be just the book to help me finally take charge of my life! Thank you so much, .

You think I should broaden my mind? I do like a challenge, and learning new things is my passion! It takes more than just a few big words in a title to scare me away from picking up a book I'm sure I'm going to learn a lot from this one Thanks so much for the recommendation, !
Let me ask you this What kind of book would you want to have with you on a deserted island?
A mystery.
A comedy.
A love story.
A business book.

Excellent and appropriate choice! There are so many mystery books set on deserted islands after all. Ooh! How exhilarating would it be to read a mystery about a deserted island ON a deserted island? And by exhilaratingI mean terrifying, !I like the way you think!

Now that I think about it, comedy really is the perfect choice.Being on a deserted island could get lonely, and having something funny to read would certainly cheer you up. Plus, you could laugh as loud as you want without disturbing anybody else, !

Oh! Is there anything better than an epic love story that transcends all space and time? Just imaginetwo castaways wash up on the shore of a deserted island.They've never met, but now they must keep each other alive.Together they fight wild beasts, brave storm after stormand face their own personal demons. Then against all odds, they fall madly in love!That book hasn't even been written yet, but it's already changed my life, !

A business book? I guess that makes sense, though the material might be a little dry for my taste. That said, a peaceful deserted island free from distractions would be a perfect place to study. I'm convinced, . Perhaps we should start our own University
I have a question for you! Don't overthink your answer.You're about to enjoy a cup of tea. So, what kind of tea are you having?
Black tea.
Green tea.
Oolong tea.
Chai tea.

I've read that how you answer is supposed to say something about how things are going in your life. I think choosing black tea means<10_4 /> You've been very busy lately, and you need to take time to relax.Does that sound right?<10_4 /> Even if it isn't, not a bad idea to relax more.

I've read that how you answer is supposed to say something about how things are going in your life. I think choosing green tea means<10_4 /> Everyone you know has been relying on you so much, you're exhausted. I care about you a lot, so if it's true that you're having a hard time, know I'm here for you, .

I've read that how you answer is supposed to say something about how things are going in your life. I think choosing oolong tea means<10_4 /> You have a really positive attitude, but sometimes you try too hard. Positivity's usually a good thing, but maybe don't force it, .

I've read that how you answer is supposed to say something about how things are going in your life. I think choosing chai tea means<10_4 /> You try to be sweet to everybody, but lately you really need to vent. Does that sound about right?<10_4 /> Sometimes we all need to let loose and de-stress, .
Has anything interesting happened to you lately, ?
You know it!
Not that I remember.
What about you?
I thought so. You look excited, so I thought I'd ask, .It's probably pretty easy to tell when I'm excited about anything.I feel like I must be easy to read
Oh. Well, let me share something interesting that happened to me!Um Now that I think about it, maybe it wasn't all that exciting.Never mind, .
Life here on is always surprising.I guess I'm just lucky to have such amazing neighbors, .
